[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Division Precision] Can integer division in price_a * DECIMAL / price_b truncate significant digits affecting slippage calculation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Multiplication Order] Should the calculation be (price_a / price_b) * DECIMAL to avoid intermediate overflow, or does current order introduce risks? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Squared Precision] Does squaring sqrt_price_u256_with_decimals lose precision that compounds in final price calculation? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Division Order] Should division by DECIMAL happen before squaring to minimize precision loss? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Rounding Inconsistency] Can inconsistent rounding between pool_price and relative_price_from_oracle cause false positive/negative slippage failures? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Constant: DECIMAL] [Magic Number] Is DECIMAL = 1e18 consistent with all price decimals across the protocol, or can decimal mismatches occur? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Constant: SLIPPAGE_BASE] [Magic Number] Is SLIPPAGE_BASE = 10000 correctly used in all calculations, and can bps/percentage confusion introduce errors? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Constant: DECIMAL] [Hardcoded Value] Should DECIMAL be configurable per coin type instead of hardcoded to 1e18? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Integration: mmt_v3] [Module Trust] Can the mmt_v3 module (liquidity_math, tick_math) be upgraded maliciously to return incorrect values? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Integration: vault] [Method Trust] Does vault.get_defi_asset properly validate position type and ownership before returning reference? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Integration: vault] [State Update] Can vault.finish_update_asset_value be called out of sequence or multiple times per position per operation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Integration: vault_oracle] [Price Source] Can vault_oracle::get_asset_price return stale, manipulated, or zero prices that bypass validation? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Integration: vault_oracle] [Decimals Source] Can config.coin_decimals return incorrect or uninitialized decimal values causing calculation errors? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Integration: vault_utils] [Price Multiplication] Does vault_utils::mul_with_oracle_price handle all edge cases (zero amounts, max amounts, zero prices)? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Integration: vault_oracle] [Slippage Config] Can config.dex_slippage() return unconfigured/default values that are unsafe (0 or 10000)? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [DoS] Can an attacker cause repeated DoS by manipulating pool price to always fail slippage check, preventing all position updates? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [DoS] Can extreme tick values in position cause tick_math functions to revert, making position unvaluable? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [DoS] Can oracle price feed failure cause all position valuations to fail, freezing vault operations? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [DoS] Can extreme decimal values cause pow() to fail or timeout, preventing price conversions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Edge Case] What happens if CoinA and CoinB are the same type - can this break type_name uniqueness in oracle lookups? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Edge Case] Can sqrt_price_x64 = 0 cause division issues or return zero price incorrectly? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Edge Case] Can both amount_a and amount_b be 0 for a position with liquidity, and does this break value calculation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Edge Case] What happens when decimals_a = decimals_b = 0 - is the price correctly calculated without scaling? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Edge Case] Can position be at extreme tick ranges (MIN_TICK or MAX_TICK) causing amount calculation failures? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Edge Case] Can sqrt_price be exactly equal to lower_tick_sqrt_price or upper_tick_sqrt_price causing boundary issues? (Low)
